RumorFact.Text: A Nomai recording on Ash Twin described plans to relocate Ember Twin's solar panels due to issues with its current site.
The Nomai planned to relocate the solar panels on Ember Twin to a grassy plateau on the surface above the Sunless City.
I found a Nomai recording in a cave under this site describing a second Quantum Moon Locator on Brittle Hollow.

ExploreFact.Text: A grassy plateau on Ember Twin's south pole that the Nomai scouted as a potential relocation site.

AltText.Text: A grassy plateau on Ember Twin's south pole that the Nomai scouted as a potential relocation site for their solar panels.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai on Ember Twin were deprived of energy by Ash Twin's shadow during sunless days.
Sunless days happen during a solar eclipse.
Leaving a set of eyes on the planet's surface allows one to detect the presence of a sunless day while underground.
